title: # 424 - Ron Funches & ME
description:
Today I chat remotely with comedian and actor Ron Funches. We talk about Mystic Rick, Trinidad James, Rogan’s video game statement, Pro Wresting, being undeniable, and much more! 

Get your tickets to Ron’s livestream comedy special “Awakening” on 09/05 here:

https://funches.eventbrite.com/

Check out his Podcast “Gettin’ Better with Ron Funches” here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/gettin-better-with-ron-funches/id1432301616 

This episode is also brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, and sexual wellness for men. Try hims today and get your first refill pack for free at www.forhims.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Quip. Get your first refill pack for free at www.GetQuip.com/Bertcast

This episode is brought to you by Policy Genius. In just a few minutes you can find your best price and apply at www.Policygenius.com

This episode is also brought to you by Miller High Life, The Champagne of Beers. A quality beer within everyone’s reach. Please enjoy responsibly. 

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
